summary: Every year we audit the consolidated financial statements of the U.S. government . During our FY 2019 audit , we found that corrective actions were not complete for 12 previously reported deficiencies in the processes used to prepare the financial statements. We also identified new deficiencies related to: the consideration of unaudited agency information included in the financial statements revised policies for reporting in accordance...
title: Management Report: Improvements Needed in Controls over the Processes Used to Prepare the U.S. Consolidated Financial Statements
topics: Consolidated Financial Statements of the U.S. Government
